title: Sosefo Sakalia
text:
Sosefo Sakalia (born 14 December 1991) is a <a href="Tongan%20people">Tongan</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He plays in the <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a> position for the <a href="Romania">Romania</a> based <a href="SuperLiga%20%28rugby%29">SuperLiga</a> side, <a href="CSA%20Steaua%20Bucure%C8%99ti%20%28rugby%29">Steaua București</a>. Sakalia also represents <a href="Tonga%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Tonga</a> at international level.
Sakalia made his international debut at the <a href="2015%20World%20Rugby%20Pacific%20Nations%20Cup">2015 World Rugby Pacific Nations Cup</a> in a match against the "<a href="Canada%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Canucks</a>". Before rejoining Steaua București in 2016, Sakalia also played for Olimpia București during 2015.
